nature_language: [当前位置南京,目标位置成都,旅行人数3,旅行天数4] 我们一家三人想去成都旅游，计划去4天 ，想去成都最经典的旅游景点，不知道去哪里比较好
nature_language_en: [Current location: Nanjing, Destination: Chengdu, Number of travelers: 3, Travel days: 4] Our family of three wants to travel to Chengdu for 4 days. We plan to visit the most classic tourist attractions in Chengdu, but we're not sure where would be the best places to go.
